lines.text: Okay, so, this is gonna get pretty scientific, but...
How about... every time his heart beats, he's using <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit</c> to teleport the blood around?
Now, I know what you're thinking- there's no fire in his blood, right? How would that work?
It's all to do with mitochondria, see? The... generator dealies of the cell.
The metabolic reaction that breaks down glucose is technically a combustion reaction, and-
-so it uses that ''fire'' to teleport the blood past the wrists, neck, and other spots you'd check a pulse!
-being r-ridiculous. The pressure differentials created by the- the ''skipping'', they'd-
Oh, Ms. Science has an opinion, now?
-the tissues ''skipped'' would suffer deoxygenation, and- and for that matter-
For chrissake, they ain't level two! This whole thing's pointless!
Yeah, Whydah! They're not level two! So why're you badgering me about this?
(One day, I'm gonna have a desk job...)
